t: Belei, Amazon’s First Skincare Brand, Is Not a Hit - Marketplace Pulse
s: August 21, 2019 - In March, Amazon launched Belei, a skincare brand consisting of cleansing wipes, moisturizers, masks, and serums. Six months later, the brand has failed to impress consumers. Belei products are rated 3.8 out of 5 stars, and none had become best-sellers.

t: Amazon Launches Belei, Its First-Ever Skin-Care Line | Allure
s: March 20, 2019 - Belei, a combination of "believe" and "beauty," is made up of 12 products — cleansing wipes, moisturizers, masks, and serums — all under $40, each designed to treat a variety of skin-care concerns, such as acne, fine lines, dark spots, dehydration, and dullness.

t: Amazon Belei Skin Care Line Review: ItÆs So Good | Glamour
s: March 20, 2019 - With its clean sans-serif-font logo and muted colors, Belei immediately reminded me of the Glossiers and Summer Fridays of the online beauty world—before you slather a bottle's contents on your face, you want to take a picture of the package. Dig inside Amazon's initial 12-product offering, and the focus of the collection is on par with the most-shopped beauty brands ...
